httpdocs
Table of Contents

PostIssuingDisputes

Creates an Issuing Dispute object. Individual pieces of evidence within the evidence object are optional at this point. Stripe only validates that required evidence is present during submission. Refer to Dispute reasons and evidence for more details about evidence requirements.

HTTP Request

POST \v1\issuing\disputes HTTP/1.1

host: api.stripe.com:443
eTag: "23423432"
accept: application/json
content-type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded


{ "example": "Example goes here" }

Parameters

Request Body Schema

{
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "amount": {
      "type": "integer",
      "description": "The dispute amount in the card's currency and in the smallest currency unit. If not set, defaults to the full transaction amount."
    },
    "evidence": {
      "title": "evidence_param",
      "type": "object",
      "properties": {
        "canceled": {

  • 200 Successful response.
  • default Error response.
